verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Let Jesus be exalted

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Christians,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We’re gathered here today

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: To Worship and Magnify the Son

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Come,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Forget about the day

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: And let this be the hour that your soul can find its strength

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: For we need Thee O LORD

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Join our hearts in one accord

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Make Your presence known

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: And be exalted in this place

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Let Jesus be

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Exalted in this place

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: I can feel His power today

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: Holy Spirit take control and bring sweet peace into my soul

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: We give thanks to you O God

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: For the mercy You have shown

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: Blessed is Your name, Let Jesus be exalted

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: His love is vaster than the sea

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: And His word provides my every need

verse.name: c1j
verse.lines: Master you’re my joy and my song it was you

verse.name: c1k
verse.lines: Who brought into my life new hope

verse.name: c1l
verse.lines: Let Jesus be exalted in this place

verse.name: c1m
verse.lines: Exalted, Exalted

verse.name: c1n
verse.lines: We give thanks to You O God

verse.name: c1o
verse.lines: Exalted

verse.name: c1p
verse.lines: Let Jesus be exalted….
